alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 12:48PM EST until March 12 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches, with the greatest amounts across the higher terrain inland from Lake Erie. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow Saturday afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Southern Erie and Wyoming counties and the western Southern Tier. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times with snow covered roads and poor visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will fall through the 20s during the day Saturday, with wind chill values falling into the single digits to near zero.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming
